001package edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.service;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import androidx.room.Query;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.dao.LocationDao;
006import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.entity.Location;
007import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
008import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
009import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
010import java.time.Instant;
011import java.util.List;
012import javax.inject.Inject;
013
014public class LocationRepository {
015
016  private final LocationDao locationDao;
017
018  @Inject
019  public LocationRepository(LocationDao locationDao) {
020    this.locationDao = locationDao;
021  }
022
023
024  public Single<Long> add(Location location){
025    return locationDao
026        .insert(location)
027        .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io());
028  }
029  public LiveData<List<Location>> getAll(){
030    return locationDao.getLocations();
031  }
032  public LiveData<List<Location>> getAllSecureOrUnsecure(boolean secure){
033    return locationDao.getLocationsSecureOrUnsecure(secure);
034  }
035  public LiveData<List<Location>> getAllTracked(){
036    return locationDao.getLocationsTracked();
037  }
038  public Completable clearAll() {
039    return locationDao.truncateLocations();
040  }
041  public Completable clearSecure(long location_id) {
042    return locationDao.truncateLocationSecure(location_id);
043  }
044  public Completable clearUnsecure(long location_id) {
045    return locationDao.truncateLocationUnsecure(location_id);
046  }
047  public Completable clearAllSecures() {
048    return locationDao.truncateLocationsSecure();
049  }
050  public Completable clearAllUnsecures() {
051    return locationDao.truncateLocationsUnsecure();
052  }
053  public Completable clearAllTracked() {
054    return locationDao.truncateLocationsTracked();
055  }
056
057}
